text: yeah, i figured it out and went module, which is pretty fine by me, but the problem is when i sent a sample look to my email everything i made is messed up in the email client (in this case it's outlook) meaning it's not carbon copy of what i did in the template  :disappointed:
Heh welcome to html email. Outlook is notorious for being the worst email client. As some tips use tables for layout, code like it's 1995 and you'll find you can get your layouts to work

Hi, i'm having a problem with my blog page, i am combining multiple blogs in single page, one issue is coming like when i open up blog page, currently it have around 150 listings of blog on single page, and it takes around 45 second in loading, is there any way to reduce loading time? Page link; <https://www.selworthy.com/blog>
hey <@U7SL518D6> thank you for this, i'll ask around in that channel.  as for the code like it's 1995, i was only 4 at the time haha
